mapper.sql: id, exhibit_time, exhibit_name, exhibit_address, create_time, create_user_id, last_modify_time, last_modify_user_id, status, exhibit_img
mapper.select: select DATE_FORMAT(a.exhibit_time,'%Yå¹´') as time,a.exhibit_name as name,a.exhibit_address as address ,b.image_path as img from exhibition a,workimages b where a.exhibit_img = b.image_id and b.status=4 order by exhibit_time
mapper.insert: insert into exhibition (id, exhibit_time, exhibit_name, exhibit_address, create_time, create_user_id, last_modify_time, last_modify_user_id, status, exhibit_img) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{exhibitTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{exhibitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exhibitAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastModifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exhibitImg,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update exhibition
exhibit_time = #{exhibitTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
exhibit_name = #{exhibitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
exhibit_address = #{exhibitAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_modify_user_id = #{lastModifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
exhibit_img = #{exhibitImg,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update exhibition set exhibit_time = #{exhibitTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, exhibit_name = #{exhibitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, exhibit_address = #{exhibitAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_modify_user_id = #{lastModifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, exhibit_img = #{exhibitImg,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
